mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.`name`, a.object_type objectType, a.enabled, a.is_used isUsed, a.remark, a.create_id createId, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime, a.last_update_id lastUpdateId, CONVERT(a.last_update_time, char) lastUpdateTime FROM team_template a
${sqlExtract}
AND (a.`name` LIKE '%${keyword}%' OR a.mobile_phone LIKE '%${keyword}%')
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
